name: Fight Boredom! Take This Quiz!  | 10 Questions

questions.text: Waiting in long lines is a terrible _______.
questions.explanation:
bore.

	That's why I wear my Walkman and listen to books on tape while I'm waiting in line.

questions.text: Please watch your step as you _______ the bus.
questions.explanation:
board.

	When you BOARD a bus, train, or plane, you get on, or climb aboard.

questions.text: Said a sow to her husband, "You're such a _______!"
questions.explanation:
boar.

	A female pig is called a sow (it rhymes with "cow"). A baby pig is called a piglet.

questions.text: Finish these phrases and compound words: chalk_______, bulletin _______, ironing _______, and surf_______.
questions.explanation:
board.

	Some beds have headboards and footboards.

questions.text: Finish these expressions: _______ to tears and _______ stiff.
questions.explanation:
bored.

	If you know any more expressions containing the word "bored," please send them to me. I'll add them to the quiz. Player Angela reminds me that people sometimes say: "bored to death."

questions.text: I hope this quiz isn't _______ you.
questions.explanation:
boring.

	One way to avoid boredom is to write Quizzyland quizzes of your own.

questions.text: The skate_______ was invented in the late 1950s.
questions.explanation:
board.

	California surfers put rollerskate wheels on boards and started "sidewalk surfing." Later businesspeople started making skateboards in factories and selling them to kids. Skateboards have changed since the 1960s, but they are still popular today.

questions.text: Hurry up! Everyone is _______ the plane.
questions.explanation:
boarding.

	When you get on a boat, it's sometimes called "embarking."

questions.text: As the speaker droned on and on, the audience members sank deeper and deeper into _______.
questions.explanation:
boredom.

	Other words with "dom" include kingdom, domain, and domination.

questions.text: Which is more _______, attending a party where you don't know anyone, or waiting for someone who is late?
questions.explanation:
boring.

	Tell me what you find fascinating (NOT boring), and I'll add your comments to this box.
